casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2006-0617. Bickers v. W. S. Life Ins. Co., Inc.

Hamilton App. No. C-040342, 2006-Ohio-572. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2004-1739, Sidenstricker v. Miller Pavement Maintenance, Inc., Franklin App. No. 03AP-827, 2004-Ohio-4653; and briefing schedule stayed.

Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
